data.comment: Today's referee, Robert Schroder, has blown to start the match.
Robert Schroder signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Union Berlin's area.
In the minute 2, Robert Schroder awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Throw-in Freiburg.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin's Robert Andrich is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 8, Joel Pohjanpalo (Union Berlin) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Freiburg defenders.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 11, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Sheraldo Becker of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
In the minute 12, Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 18, At An der alten Forsterei, Union Berlin are penalized for being offside.
Union Berlin attack but Joel Pohjanpalo's header doesn't find the target.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Robert Schroder signals a Freiburg throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Sheraldo Becker of Union Berlin smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Union Berlin capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
In the minute 25, Union Berlin surge into the attack at An der alten Forsterei but Marcus Ingvartsenâ€™s header is off-target.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Robert Schroder awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Union Berlin.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Union Berlin's Robert Andrich fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Freiburg at An der alten Forsterei.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Freiburg have got their heads in front thanks to a Vincenzo Grifo strike.
In the minute 34, Christian Gunter instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Robert Andrich.
Robert Schroder awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Max Kruse (Union Berlin) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 39, Marcus Ingvartsen for Union Berlin has been booked by Robert Schroder and receives a first yellow card.
Freiburg are coming forward and Vincenzo Grifo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Freiburg.
Robert Schroder signals a Freiburg throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at An der alten Forsterei.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo breaks free at An der alten Forsterei. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Robert Schroder awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of Freiburg.
In Berlin Union Berlin attack through Sheraldo Becker. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
In the minute 49, Union Berlin pushes forward through Christian Gentner, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Berlin, Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Baptiste Santamaria gets his shot on target but fails to score for Freiburg.
In the minute 50, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Berlin.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Robert Schroder signals a Freiburg throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 54, Freiburg needs to be cautious. Union Berlin have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Freiburg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 57, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Berlin Freiburg drive forward through Vincenzo Grifo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Freiburg.
In the minute 59, Union Berlin make their first substitution with Marius Bulter replacing Marcus Ingvartsen.
Lucas Holer for Freiburg drives towards goal at An der alten Forsterei. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Baptiste Santamaria with Lino Tempelmann. This is the first substitution made today by Christian Streich.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Union Berlin in Berlin.
In the minute 63, Robert Schroder awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
Robert Schroder awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Union Berlin drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Freiburg close to the penalty box.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Lino Tempelmann (Freiburg) has received a yellow card from Robert Schroder.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Joel Pohjanpalo with Taiwo Awoniyi.
Urs Fischer is making the team's third substitution at An der alten Forsterei with Keita Endo replacing Sheraldo Becker.
Urs Fischer (Union Berlin) is making a fourth substitution, with Sebastian Griesbeck replacing Christian Gentner.
In the minute 73, Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Union Berlin just outside Freiburg's area.
Max Kruse (Union Berlin) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Roland Sallai (Freiburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Freiburg.
Goal kick for Freiburg at An der alten Forsterei.
Chang-Hoon Kwon is replacing Roland Sallai for Freiburg at An der alten Forsterei.
Woo-yeong Jeong is on a sub for Vincenzo Grifo for Freiburg.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 80, Philipp Lienhart is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
In the minute 81, Union Berlin have a dangerous throw-in.
Julian Ryerson is replacing Christopher Trimmel for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Union Berlin needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
In the minute 87, Union Berlin's Marvin Friedrich gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Freiburg at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Christian Streich is making the team's fourth substitution at An der alten Forsterei with Ermedin Demirovic replacing Nils Petersen.
Freiburg's Nicolas Hofler has been booked in Berlin.
In the minute 89, Union Berlin's Marvin Friedrich attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
At An der alten Forsterei the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Freiburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Union Berlin.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
